biotools.summary: Scoring system to detect difficult-to-assess regions with an easy-to-use track for looking at structural variant and repeat regions. This track, can be displayed alongside the existing Genome Reference Consortium assembly tracks to warn clinicians and biologists when variants of interest may be incorrectly called, of dubious quality, or on an insertion or copy number expansion.
